description: Sum of terms in period of continued fraction for sqrt(n).
comments: The entry for a perfect square is 0.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: f[n_] := If[ IntegerQ[ Sqrt[n]], 0, Apply[ Plus, Last[ ContinuedFraction[ Sqrt[n]]]]]; Table[ f[n], {n, 1, 100} ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Walter Gilbert
